sshub
=====

Usage
~~~~~

Start the ``sshub`` server:

.. code-block:: console

    $ sshub

Configure a tunnel:

.. code-block:: console
    
    $ curl -XPOST http://${SSHUB_HOST}:4080/links/ -d '{
        "port": 12345,
        "from": {
    		"public_key": "ssh-rsa ",
    		"user": "alice",
    	},
    	"to": {
    		"public_key": "ssh-rsa ",
    		"user": "bob",
    	}    
    }'

Connect from both sides:

.. code-block:: console

    alice$ ssh -NL 1001:localhost:12345 -p 4022 alice@${SSHUB_HOST}
    bob$ ssh -NR 12345:localhost:1002 -p 4022 bob@${SSHUB_HOST}

Connect to ``bob:1002`` from ``alice:1001``:

.. code-block:: console

    alice$ nc localhost 1001


Compilation
~~~~~~~~~~~

.. code-block:: console

    $ go build


Tests
~~~~~

.. code-block:: console

    $ cd tests
    $ python -m unittest
